thread.title: LeBron James takes selfie with fans during break in game
thread.title_full: LeBron James takes selfie with fans during break in game

author: Sheetal Kotha
title: LeBron James takes selfie with fans during break in game
text:
LeBron James takes selfie with fans during break in game FOXSports 21 hrs ago Sheetal Kotha The Cavaliers preseason tipped off in Cincinnati Wednesday night vs. the Hawks. In the third quarter during a referee review, LeBron James took a moment to take a selfie with some fans.
AdChoices Nothing like taking a selfie with LeBron! #TipTober pic.twitter.com/lA3x1WsKBF
— FOX Sports Ohio (@FOXSportsOH) October 8, 2015 @pdillion24 waited until after the game to share the epic selfie. A moment these kids will never forget.
The #LeBronSelfie pic.twitter.com/W0ivwUHwLQ
— Patrick Dillon (@pdillon24) October 8, 2015 Go to MSN Home
